name: Car Parking Spot Detector
desc: Real-Time Car Parking Spot Detector using OpenCV that counts occupied and free spaces from a video footage providing insights for parking management systems

name: WatchDog PC
desc: Using OpenCV to take a picture when there's a face detected and save it into your laptop's directory, without showing the cam to the user

name: A-Sorted: Sorting Visualizer
desc: Visualize 7 Sorting Algos (bubble, selection, insertion, heap, radix-lsd, quick, merge) with dynamic delay and array size toggle for better UX; along with copyable codes

name: Nodejs Realtime Chat App
desc: A Real time chat app with websockets using Node.js, Express and Socket.io with Vanilla JS on the frontend with a custom UI

name: Yulu Bike Rental
desc: Developed a Random Forest Regression model, with an impressive R-squared value of 0.85, to help Yulu identify key factors such as temp, season etc that improve bike prediction
